# Issue 23150
[!short] go test -o=$WORK/x.test -cpuprofile=$WORK/cpu_profile_twice.out x
[!short] rm $WORK/cpu_profile_twice.out

[!short] go test -o=$WORK/x.test -cpuprofile=$WORK/cpu_profile_twice.out x
[!short] exists $WORK/cpu_profile_twice.out


-- x/x_test.go --
package x_test
import (
    "testing"
    "time"
)
func TestSleep(t *testing.T) {
    time.Sleep(10 * time.Millisecond)
}
